com.basho.riak.client.builders

Class RiakObjectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.builders.RiakObjectBuilder

  • public class RiakObjectBuilder
extends Object
    Creates instances of DefaultRiakObject

    russell
